channel.title: [298]Walking when clicked on minimap
channel.description:
I have downloaded a blank 289 Hyperion that is completely blank besides the fact it has (most) packets. Now when I click on the actual screen the player will walk there, however, when I click on the mini-map somewhere it won't walk to that point.
Anybody got a solution? I'm not too good with the concept of walking and how clicking on the mini-map is different from the actual screen...
If you for some reason need pictures for more explanation, ask.
